title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton and wool embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: buttonhole, overcasting, darning and drawnwork stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Twenty patterns worked in drawnwork, cutwork and embroidery. Geometric and floral patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton and wool embroidery, linen foundation
